articles.description: Samridhii Shukla has impressed the audience as Abhira Sharma in Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai. Fans are comparing Abhira with her father, Abhinav Sharma.
articles.content: Harshad Chopda and Pranali Rathod left Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai and the new story of the show began yesterday. It was the first episode of Samridhii Shukla and Shehzada Dhami as Abhira and Armaan. … [+3937 chars]

articles.author: Nandini Ramnath
articles.title: ‘Rainbow Rishta’ review: A docuseries with heart and spunk - Scroll.in
articles.description: Jaydeep Sarkar’s six-episode series is out on Prime Video.
articles.content: There is plenty of warmth alongside coruscating observations in Rainbow Rishta, which revolves around members of the Indian LGBTQIA+ community. There is topicality too the Prime Video docuseries firm… [+3656 chars]

articles.title: Thug Life by Mani – Sisu Vibes! - M9
articles.description: 'Thug Life' suggests that Kamal Haasan's character might draw inspiration from the recent unapologetic Hollywood action film, 'Sisu.'
articles.content:
After the two-part ‘Ponniyin Selvan,’ the master director Mani Ratnam has embarked on another thrilling project, ‘Thug Life,’ which takes a different tone compared to his usual films.
